message: Let's start fair, I'll take 90% and you can have the remaining 10%, but be warned, this is just the beginning, and the money will depreciate for me in every following round. So if you reject this, I will be pushing for a bigger share in the next round.
Alice, your offer was heavily skewed in your favor. Let's be reasonable - I'm proposing a 70/30 split in my favor.  The value depreciates for both of us, so dragging this out only hurts us both.

Okay, I see you're playing tough. I'm willing to compromise, but I won't go lower than 40% for me.  Remember, every round that passes means I lose more value.  Let's end this before we both lose too much.
